name: Valentine Kiss: Birthdays 2
summary: Valentine Kiss is a dating simulation game, very similar to Birthdays, only instead of "conquering" a girl as a birthday present, the goal here is to "score" on Valentine's Day
info:
• 开发: シルキーズ
  • 剧本: 藤木隻
  • 别名: バレンタインキッス ～バースデイズ２～
  • 发行日期: 1996-02-09
  • 原画: 悠宇樹
